backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with data models for glossary, articles, research papers, market data, blogs, and access control, along with initialization of in‑memory maps and IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented glossary bulk-import admin features with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries for major frontend files describing their purpose, UI behavior, and integration with backend queries.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Documentation describing deployment retry steps, troubleshooting, and asset verification for the application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme tokens, OKLCH color variables, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file configuring fonts, icons, metadata, root mount point, and script loading for the frontend app.
frontend/scripts/README.md: Explains available deployment helper scripts and their purpose.
frontend/scripts/retry-build-and-deploy-: Shell script automating multi-stage build and deployment with logging and error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Query, theming, routing, and maintenance-mode gating while rendering the main layout with header, footer, and chat widget.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the brand logo with error handling and a text fallback when the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Cash: Reusable cash‑flow table component with optional running balance and CSV export support.
frontend/src/components/calculators/Resu: Placeholder file intended for a bar chart breakdown component; currently empty.
Generates an SVG donut chart showing invested vs earned amounts with percentage calculations and empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/components/ChatAssistantWid: Implements an on-page chat assistant with intent detection, backend calls, message state, and disclaimers.
frontend/src/components/domain/CustomDom: Empty placeholder for a custom‑domain FAQ component.
Empty placeholder for a custom‑domain setup guide component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a dynamic NIFTY 50 ticker based on Indian market hours along with footer UI elements.
frontend/src/components/GlossaryBackupRe: Provides UI to export, import, validate, and restore glossary snapshot files with merge or replace options.
frontend/src/components/GlossaryBulkImpo: Allows bulk publishing of predefined C‑terms to the glossary with confirmation and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header with theme toggle, auth actions via Internet Identity, and dynamic menu lists including calculators and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/MaintenanceScree: Full‑screen maintenance notice showing brand logo, icon, and explanatory text.
frontend/src/data/glossaryBulkImportC.ts: Static batch of glossary entries for C‑terms used for bulk importing into the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, managing login, logout, identity persistence, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains multiple React Query hooks for fetching and mutating data from the backend actor, including maintenance mode, user profiles, chat, glossary, and more.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark theme customization using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, and philosophy sections using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Displays categorized financial articles using tabs and fetches articles per category via React Query.
frontend/src/pages/AtalPensionYojanaCalc: Provides an APY calculator that computes monthly contributions and corpus based on age and desired pension.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Loads and displays a single blog post with metadata, tags, content, and fallback error handling.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Displays a list of blogs with loading and error states, showing blog cards with metadata and navigation to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/CAGRCalculatorPage.ts: Provides a CAGR calculator with user inputs for values and years, computes the growth rate, and displays the result.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Lists categorized financial calculators with icons, descriptions, and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact and feedback form, submitting feedback via a backend actor and showing email contact options.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Shows legal disclaimers and risk warnings about financial content, emphasizing educational purpose only.
frontend/src/pages/DomainNamePage.tsx: Empty or placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/EMICalculatorPage.tsx: Provides an EMI calculator that computes monthly payments, total interest, and total repayment based on loan inputs.
frontend/src/pages/EPFCalculatorPage.tsx: Implements an EPF calculator computing contributions, interest, and maturity balance using salary and rate inputs.
frontend/src/pages/FDCalculatorPage.tsx: Generates simple or compound interest FD calculations to show maturity amount and interest earned.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackAdminPage.tsx: Displays an admin-only feedback management panel with authentication, search, sorting, and table rendering.
frontend/src/pages/FixedVsReducingLoanCa: Compares fixed-rate vs reducing-balance loan costs by calculating total interest and repayment for each method.
frontend/src/pages/GlossaryPage.tsx: Glossary search page that fetches, groups, and displays financial terms with admin tools for backup and bulk import.
frontend/src/pages/GratuityCalculatorPag: Calculator page that computes gratuity based on last salary and years of service using the standard gratuity formula.
frontend/src/pages/GSTCalculatorPage.tsx: React page that collects amount and GST rate to compute CGST, SGST, total tax, and final amount.
frontend/src/pages/HomeLoanEMICalculator: Home loan EMI calculator that computes EMI, total interest, and repayment based on loan amount, interest rate, and tenure.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero, feature sections, and navigation buttons to learning, glossary, and research pages.
frontend/src/pages/HRACalculatorPage.tsx: HRA calculator that computes exempt and taxable HRA based on salary, DA, rent paid, and metro/non‑metro rules.
frontend/src/pages/LearningPage.tsx: Displays structured financial education sections using an accordion, loading states, and fetched content.
frontend/src/pages/LumpSumCalculatorPage: Provides a lump‑sum investment calculator using compound interest, input fields, and result visualization.
frontend/src/pages/NPSCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates NPS corpus, annuity portion, and monthly pension based on user inputs for contributions and age.
frontend/src/pages/NSCCalculatorPage.tsx: Computes NSC maturity value and interest earned using compound interest with user‑provided inputs.
frontend/src/pages/PPFCalculatorPage.tsx: Implements a PPF return calculator computing total invested, interest earned, and maturity value over the tenure.
frontend/src/pages/RDCalculatorPage.tsx: Recurring Deposit calculator page with inputs for monthly amount, rate, and tenure, computing deposit, interest, and maturity values.
frontend/src/pages/RegulationsPage.tsx: Displays SEBI/RBI guidelines and fraud awareness info with tabs and regulatory content sections.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchPapersPage.ts: Fetches and lists research papers with download links, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleInterestCalcula: Page component that calculates simple interest from principal, rate, and time inputs and displays formatted results.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleVsCompoundInter: Page that compares simple and compound interest based on user inputs including compounding frequency and shows the difference.
frontend/src/pages/SIPCalculatorPage.tsx: SIP calculator page computing future value, invested amount, and returns with optional cash flow charts.
frontend/src/pages/SSYCalculatorPage.tsx: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana calculator computing maturity value, deposit years, and interest based on yearly contributions.
Page providing step-up SIP calculations by amount or percentage, computing total value, invested amount, and returns.
frontend/src/pages/SWPCalculatorPage.tsx: SWP calculator simulating monthly withdrawals, balance growth, and final corpus over a chosen duration.
frontend/src/pages/XIRRCalculatorPage.ts: Page to compute XIRR using user-defined dated cash flows and a Newton-Raphson approximation.
frontend/src/utils/arthSaathiChat.ts: Utility functions for detecting language, intent, and generating refusal responses for the ArthSaathi chat assistant.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Centralized helper for generating asset URLs using Vite’s base path handling and storing brand asset paths.
frontend/src/utils/cashFlowSchedules.ts: Utility functions to generate cash flow labels and schedules, including monthly/yearly contributions and running balances.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Provides CSV field escaping, array-to-CSV conversion, and browser CSV download helpers.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Contains number, currency (INR), and percentage formatting utilities using Indian conventions.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryFormatting.ts: Parses glossary definitions to extract main text and 'Also read' references and normalizes term names.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryKey.ts: Generates deterministic normalized keys for glossary terms and maps terms to backend-compatible keys.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter extraction, session persistence, and safe parameter removal for both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, issues, and feature requests for glossary and blog management.
